data.title: Dr. John Mo - "The King Is Born"
data.meta_description: Dr. John Mo premieres the official music video for his previously released single, "The King Is Born," now available for viewing on his YouTube channel.
data.text:
Dr. John Mo premieres the official music video for his previously released single, “The King Is Born,” now available for viewing on his YouTube channel.

In the spirit of Christmas, we joyously commemorate the birth of Jesus, hailed as the King and Saviour of the world. This season serves as a reminder of the profound purpose behind His birth, fostering a collective celebration marked by the exchange of gifts and expressions of joy.

Wishing you a Merry Christmas filled with the warmth of love, the joy of giving, and the blessings that accompany the celebration of this special season.

The video was directed by Mosax Godsbreath.

Watch the music video below:

The King Is Born – Lyrics

Written By Dr. John Mo

Verse 1:

Summer’s gone, winter is here

Raining snow falling down

Brighter day giving way for the night

What a silent night

(What a silent night)

Freezing night in Bethlehem

Virgin mother bore a child

Manger-born King of all, angels sang

What a joyous night

(What a joyous night)

Chorus:

The season’s come

(The season’s come)

Nations sing His praise

(I hear the Christmas sound)

I hear the Christmas sound

(‘Cause the King is born)

‘Cause the King is born

(Christmas is here)

The season’s come

(The season’s come)

Nations sing His praise

(I hear the Christmas sound)

I hear the Christmas sound

(‘Cause the King)

‘Cos the King is born

Verse 2:

Summer’s gone, winter is here

Raining snow falling down

Brighter day giving way for the night

What a silent night

(What a silent night)

Angels praise, wise men sing

(Uh uh uh uh)

Northern stars glow for the way

To find the Lamb and Savior born

To save the world

‘Cos the King is born
